results.title: Metformin promotes the osseointegration of titanium implants under osteoporotic conditions by regulating BMSCs autophagy, and osteogenic differentiation.
results.text_hl: Considering the widespread use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, the results of the present study might promote a novel understanding of the positive effects of local @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ delivery on @<m>DISEASE_Hypohidrosis_with_Abnormal_Palmar_Dermal_Ridges</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565481 @@@alveolar ridge defect@@@, and have potential clinical application for the acceleration of osseointegration.

citations.NLM: Lin J, Xu R, Shen X, Jiang H, Du S. Metformin promotes the osseointegration of titanium implants under osteoporotic conditions by regulating BMSCs autophagy, and osteogenic differentiation. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 2020 Oct 15;531(2):228-235. PMID: 32800340
